TITLE: Photos capture Hong Kong's disappearing past
SUMMARY: Over the last five decades, photographer Keith Macgregor has borne witness to dramatic change in Hong Kong.

TITLE: Daylight Saving Time: Why we have it
SUMMARY: Daylight Saving Time makes our clocks "Spring forward" and "Fall back." CNN's Jennifer Gray explains why.

TITLE: A brief history of the red carpet
SUMMARY: The red carpet predates the Academy Awards -- or any awards -- by over 2,400 years. At least.
